abstract: BP and Statoil say they are withdrawing their employees from In Salah natural gas field and processing plant in Krechba, Algeria, after Islamic terrorists target complex for second time in three years; says Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb claimed responsibility for latest attack, which caused no damage or casualties but interrupted production.

headline.print_headline: BP and Statoil Withdraw Workers in Algeria Attacks
headline.main: BP and Statoil Pull Employees From Algeria Gas Fields After Attack

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: An affiliate of Al Qaeda claimed responsibility for a grenade attack that hit one of the largest natural gas fields in Algeria.
lead_paragraph: An affiliate of Al Qaeda claimed responsibility for a grenade attack that hit one of the largest natural gas fields in Algeria.
